title: The Fire King
description: INTRODUCINGThe first in the Alterra Histories series of NOVELLAS.From the creator of the beloved ELFHUNTER Series comes a tale of fate and faith, of the perils of pride, and of the power of love itself — as a King is forced to confront that which he has long denied–that which is in us all.The Shadow has come to Alterra: a force of such power and terror that none may stand against it. It has but one purpose: to lure Aincor to his doom.The ebook is availabe at
author: C.S. Marks
